members.description: Number that represents the current scroll position. The value is between minScrollPosition and maxScrollPosition inclusively.

Sets the range and viewport size of the ScrollBar control.  The ScrollBar control updates the state of the arrow buttons and size of the scroll thumb accordingly.   scrolling range.  scrolling range.  the scroll track is pressed.

values: pageSize Number which represents the size of one page.
minScrollPosition Number which represents the bottom of the
maxScrollPosition Number which represents the top of the
pageScrollSize Number which represents the increment to move when
